name: Aditi
greetingText: Guess what? Today’s the day we’ve all been waiting for...your birthday! 🎉
wishText: May your life be as bright and beautiful as your smile, lighting up every moment. ✨
textInChatBox: Sending you infinite happiness, love, and cake! 🍰🎁
text2: I had a thousand wishes planned for today.
text4: I realized that today deserves something even more
text5Content: You are one of a kind! 🎉
wishHeading: To the Queen of the Day!
outroText:
Her eyes resemble the moon
and she wears an invisible crown.
Only her smile is always shown,
But I know the way she crazily frowns.
I promise your dreams will never be torn,
and even the stars have sworn.
Trust me, you'll never be alone,
and it's your smile that will be worn.
Aditi, may you live long,
I am always beside you singing happy songs! 💫
replayText: Want to relive the magic? Click here!
